title: A Bird's Eye Hippo CMS Architectural View Part 1: 10,000 foot view
description: This series of blogs will be a representation on my view of our stack.

title: Improved search for Hippo CMS websites using ElasticSearch
description: I'll discuss the requirements for creating (near) real time search using Hippo workflow events

title: Measuring Hippo CMS Fast Date Range Queries
description: Note that the fast Hippo Date Range Queries use a negligible amount of memory!

title: Reproducible and falsifiable performance tests with Hippo CMS
description: I have always been obsessed with performance, and whenever we were asked to add a feature that could not ever perform, we did not add it to the delivery tier.

title: The False Premise of Open Source Vs. Proprietary
description: Jeroen Verberg provides you with some insight on the ongoing Open vs. Closed source debate.

title: Hippo Fridays @ Hippo
description: Hippo Fridays are monthly Fridays on which all Hippo developers can share knowledge, try out new things, work on improvements or hack on their own pet project.

title: CMS 7.8 nailed down authorization combined with searches
description: A small extra step in our Hippo Repository, a major leap on authorization combined with searches.

title: Woonsan Ko on node.js as a Reverse Proxy
description: Node.js is great! You can test your Hippo CMS 7 project with full-featured Reverse Proxy Server on your local development machine SO EASILY!

title: Jeroen Reijn on WebJars
description: In most Java projects a dependency management system is used like Maven, Ivy or Gradle.

title: Jasha Joachimsthal on Phonegap, Widgets, Rave and Hippo
description: Last week we had the pleasure of hosting the Dutch Apache Meetup over here at the Hippo headquarters in Amsterdam.
